message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $200. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. I'm willing to pay a fair price, but I'd like to save some money if possible.
Bob, I appreciate your interest. However, $120 is significantly below its value. I could meet you halfway at $160. This is my final offer.

I understand that the product has value, but $160 is still a bit steep for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll offer $140. I'm trying to be reasonable, but I really need to stay within my budget.
